original_title: The Bollywood Dance Workout with Hemalayaa
overview: Inspired by the Indian film tradition of infectiously expressive music and dance comes a sexy, saucy, calorie-burning, full-body workout. Fitness star Hemalayaa leads you in traditional moves that will tone you head to toe while unleashing waves of energy and joy.
tagline: Shimmy, shake, and play Bhangra style!
title: The Bollywood Dance Workout with Hemalayaa
